channel.title: CVE Feed for Paul Bearne -- all

item.title: CVE-2024-47370|2024-10-07T13:14:50.416Z -- paul%20bearne -- author%20avatars%20list%2Fblock
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Paul Bearne Author Avatars List/Block allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Author Avatars List/Block: from n/a through 2.1.21.
